message: Let's split fairly, 60% for me, 40% for you!
I'm feeling generous, 55% for me, 45% for you. Don't wait too long though, the clock is ticking!
Come on, let's be reasonable! 58% for me, 42% for you is a good deal, considering the inflation!
This is my final offer: 52% for me. Take it before inflation eats up even more of the pie!
You said that was your final offer, but I'm giving you one more chance. 57% for me is the lowest I'll go!
